channel.title: Re: packing unpacking?
channel.description: hey ive finally finished my server and i wanna release it to a few people (not live) just to a few people but i dont wanna send them al the files that are avalible to thier eyes... can sumone tell me how 2 pak the .java files into the .classes or do w/e i need to before i release it so they cant edit ANYTHING like the live servers... where u cnt c any of the files used by the host/owner... just a little help ^^?? on wtf to do lol cuz im lost o.O

how can i fix this? -.-’ i tried re doing the compiler by delting it putting the old back and resetting the code for it as in the source compile code aswell… i can get on the client but my friends cant and it portfowarded 2 45394 (or w/e the defualt port it supposed 2 be as in rsps tut) both ports ate open for tcp and the other the client connect port is also 45394… idk what the issue is? maybe its cuz my client wont compile now?

btw sorry for switching topics wuts the point of making a new post -.-’? just more spam…

thanks for helping me with the closed source issue now help for this…

Read full topic

item.title: Re: packing unpacking?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

I assume you want it to be closed source? If so, compile the files then delete the Java ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: packing unpacking?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Just compile the .java files and you will see their .class counterparts.

Read full topic
